header.title: otp_mib

description.p: The SNMP application should be used to start an SNMP agent. Then the API functions below can be used to load/unload the OTP-MIB into/from the agent. The instrumentation of the OTP-MIB uses Mnesia, hence Mnesia must be started prior to loading the OTP-MIB.
